Key Match Events: Kawhi Leonard scored 12 points in his first game of the season
Ivica Zubac had 18 points and 18 rebounds
Trae Young led Atlanta with 20 points and 14 assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: James Harden had 13 assists in the first half, a record for the Clippers since 1996-97
Terance Mann also returned to the lineup and scored 12 points in 16 minutes
Others: Jalen Johnson and Bogdan Bogdanovic did not play for the Hawks due to injury management
The Clippers snapped a two-game losing streak
The Hawks have dropped their last three games after winning four straight
